title: Europe spends €26bn on offshore wind in 2020
lead: Almost 200,000 people will be working in the European offshore wind industry by 2030, a new report predicts

title: New expert group to assess climate impact on Norway’s sovereign wealth fund
lead: The Ministry of Finance is concerned how climate change and policies could affect the management, risk and returns of the $1tn Government Pension Fund Global

title: Cumbria coal mine approval to be reconsidered
lead: West Cumbria County Council will review the plan ‘under the light of new information’

title: Solid non-recyclable waste to renewable gas project launched
lead: Waste wood, paper, cardboard and plastic will be converted to renewable gas

title: Unmapped plants put biodiversity at risk
lead: Plants that are increasingly disappearing miss the ‘gold standard’ of scientific research, experts warn

title: Uniper to make green hydrogen at Dutch port
lead: The project will be built at an existing facility in the port of Rotterdam by 2025

title: ‘World’s first’ flight on sustainable synthetic kerosene jets off
lead: The KLM flight from Amsterdam to Madrid used 500 litres of sustainable fuel

title: Driving test fails emit 2k tonnes of CO2
lead: The amount is the equivalent CO2 from 449 return trips from London to Melbourne, according to a new study

title: Circular economy: New coalition launched for Latin America and the Caribbean
lead: The Regional Coalition on Circular Economy will support access to financing by governments and the private sector, with special emphasis on small and medium businesses

title: GE wins funding for research into 3D printing of wind turbine blades
lead: It will develop and demonstrate an integrated additive manufacturing process for novel high-performance blade designs for the future of large rotors
